text: <s>[INST] I feel overwhelmed with school and life. [/INST] It's completely okay to feel that way. Can you tell me more about what's been stressing you out lately?</s>
<s>[INST] I have trouble sleeping at night. [/INST] Sleep issues can be really tough. Have you noticed any patterns or thoughts that keep you awake?</s>
<s>[INST] I don't feel motivated to do anything. [/INST] Lack of motivation can be a sign of burnout or emotional fatigue. When did you start feeling this way?</s>
<s>[INST] I get anxious when I talk to people. [/INST] Social anxiety is more common than people realize. Do you remember when this started or what situations make it worse?</s>
<s>[INST] I miss someone who passed away. [/INST] I'm so sorry for your loss. Grieving takes time, and it's okay to feel a mix of emotions. Would you like to talk more about them?</s>
<s>[INST] I'm constantly overthinking everything. [/INST] Overthinking can be mentally exhausting. What kind of thoughts tend to repeat in your mind?</s>
<s>[INST] I feel like I'm not good enough no matter what I do. [/INST] That sounds really painful. Can you remember when these feelings started for you?</s>
<s>[INST] I'm scared of failing. [/INST] Fear of failure is a common struggle. What does failure mean to you personally?</s>
<s>[INST] I feel like no one understands me. [/INST] Feeling misunderstood can be very isolating. Would you like to tell me more about what makes you feel that way?</s>
<s>[INST] I’ve been feeling really lonely lately. [/INST] Loneliness can be deeply painful. Are there times you feel more or less alone?</s>
<s>[INST] I don't enjoy the things I used to love. [/INST] That’s a common sign of emotional exhaustion. When did you notice this shift in yourself?</s>
<s>[INST] I always compare myself to others. [/INST] Comparison can really hurt your self-esteem. What kind of things do you often compare?</s>
<s>[INST] I get angry at little things. [/INST] It sounds like there may be underlying stress or tension. What do you think is fueling that anger?</s>
<s>[INST] I feel numb and disconnected. [/INST] Emotional numbness is often a way our mind protects us. Would you like to explore what might be underneath that numbness?</s>
<s>[INST] I'm tired all the time even after sleeping. [/INST] That kind of fatigue can be emotional or mental as well. Has anything been weighing on you lately?</s>
<s>[INST] I have a hard time trusting people. [/INST] Building trust takes time, especially if you’ve been hurt before. Have there been experiences that made trust difficult for you?</s>
<s>[INST] I always feel like I'm a burden. [/INST] Feeling like a burden is a painful belief. What makes you feel that way about yourself?</s>
<s>[INST] I can't stop thinking about past mistakes. [/INST] Holding onto past mistakes can be heavy. Is there a specific memory that comes up often?</s>
<s>[INST] I feel like I’m losing control of my life. [/INST] That feeling can be very overwhelming. What areas of your life feel the most chaotic right now?</s>
<s>[INST] I don’t know what I want anymore. [/INST] It’s okay to feel uncertain. Sometimes we lose touch with ourselves when we’re under too much pressure. Would you like help exploring that?</s>
